## Description
## Reference Issue
Fixes #

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Chore (dependency updates, CI/CD tweaks, refactoring)

## Pre-Merge Checklist
- [ ] My commits are signed with GPG (`Signed-off-by`).
- [ ] My branch has a linear history (squash or rebase, no merge commits).
- [ ] I have included the organization's license header (SPDX) in all new source files.
- [ ] I have incremented the version number in `pubspec.yaml` (App) or `package.json` (Server) if required.
- [ ] I have run the formatting and linting tools successfully.
- [ ] I have added/updated unit, widget and integration tests to cover my changes.
- [ ] All CI status checks (Fast Check / Release Pre-Merge Gate) pass.
